rules_text:
{G}{W}{U} ENCHANTRESS Cast enchantment spells and get bonuses for casting them.
[/b]{W}{U}{B} MAGE SUPREMACY Druid, Shaman, Warlock, and Wizard creatures power your spellcasting. [i](Druids, Shaman, Warlocks, and Wizards are mages.)[/i]
{U}{B}{R} CURSE YOU! Curses are back. Pile them onto your opponents. While they suffer under their weight, gain the advantage.
{B}{R}{G} ASHEN MONSTROSITY Monstrosity returns. Many creatures gain new effects and abilities when you invest mana.
{R}{G}{W} STRAIN These spells offer extra power for a hefty price. Use other sources of mana production to bypass the downsides.
{W}{U}{B}{R}{G} FABLES New Saga cards with the fable let you choose which chapter to trigger regardless of the order it appears on the card. Careful though, you can still only trigger each chapter once.
